Trigger The resurrection dragon ends their turn

Requirements The dragon's Soul Siphoning Breath recharged this turn

Effect Excess void energy spills out from the dragon in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]. Each living creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:|options:area-effect] save with a DC equal to the dragon's Soul Siphoning Breath or gain weakness to void equal to the dragon's resistance to spirit for 1 round (or 1 minute on a critical failure).
